channel.title: Git on Jannik Arndt
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Jannik Arndt

item.title: April Fools': “We rewrote it in Rust” or How To Fake A GitHub Repo
item.description: We recently had another team rewrite their service in Rust, with a massive boost in performance. So naturally, for April Fools' I made a big announcement that our team followed suit: But, at good prank isn’t just “I thought this was true, but it wasn’t”. It’s “I though it was a joke, but for a brief moment doubted that”. The “Oh, no, he didn’t"-moment. Alas, one more line was necessary:

item.title: Git in one Image
item.description: I tried to create a single image that contains all the most important git commands:
